content: Locria Cyber has marked this topic as resolved.
Is there a postfix version? This is like .await in Rust, where postfix makes more sense.

You can use the Monad bind operator >>= and friends like >> or > or other category theory operators like <$> and <> but there is no postfix operator with the exact same semantics per se. >>= gets closest (because it is the underlying implementation of <-)
